name: compressRequiresCraftingGrid
description: Set this to false if you want the (de)compress feature to work outside of crafting GUIs (only works if installed on server while in the player inventory)

name: compressDenylist
description: A list of modid:name entries that will not be crafted by the compress key.

name: rightClickCraftsStack
description: If set to true, right-clicking the result slot in a crafting table will craft a full stack.

name: hideVanillaCraftingGuide
description: We both know JEI is much better. This option hides Vanilla's crafting book button instead of moving it.

name: mode
description: Set to 'DEFAULT' to enable both buttons and hotkeys. Set to 'BUTTONS' to enable buttons only. Set to 'HOTKEYS' to enable hotkeys only. Set to 'DISABLED' to disable completely.

name: disabledAddons
description: Add mod ids here of mods that you wish to disable Crafting Tweaks support for.
